ygData.subject: Re: Just for fun
ygData.msgSnippet: heh.. that s funny -- you guys killing mobs that have no chance against you.  I ve had some fun myself.  I went to the derv sites in nro and I bumped into my
ygData.messageBody:
heh.. that's funny -- you guys killing mobs that have no chance
against you. I've had some fun myself. I went to the derv sites in
nro and I bumped into my friend I haven't seen for a looong time. It
was great seeing him again. We bumped into each other at derv3 i
think? I don't remember. Haven't been to dervs for so long so I
don't remember which number is what. Anyway, it was the one with
that DE and we creamed it. Haha~~ it was pretty funny. I just nuked
it once and it started running away or rather walking away hehe. And
speaking of other fun, killing HGs or SGs is fun :) They fall like
trees!

--- In EverQuest@y..., "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@v...> wrote:
> hehe that's always fun to do...my wizzie (23) stopped an entire
Swarm in NK with a couple of AOE's...the kiddies sure loved that...or
Thyla's trick of completely clearing the Gnoll camp at Rathe, the
entire Aviak city, Paw back to the doors, or CB's throne room for
them to get corpses.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
> To: EverQuest@y...
> Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 10:25 PM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Just for fun
>
>
> Speaking of fun, my brother (lvl 27 Paladin), my guildmate (lvl
20 warr) and
> myself (lvl 29 cleric) owned Crushbone yesterday. We went in and
killed
> every single orc just for fun. There was nobody else there so we
owned the
> place. It was great!
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I have managed to get my ranger 14 levels without getting
killed and
> > my druid all the way from 1 to 21 before getting snuffed.
> >
> > My rogue on the other hand... oi!
> >
> > Sweetwood Runebow 30 Ranger
> > Clancie Rocport 39 Druid
> > Clan of the Roc-Bristlebane
> >
> > --- In EverQuest@y..., kwarden@p... wrote:
> > > Since it has been quiet I was just wondering how many levels
others
> > > have gone without dying.
> > >
> > > p.s. without being twinked,buffed or power leveled.
